name: Dimension Shift (Kyle Shepherd)
description:
Dimension Shift is a first-person puzzle platformer with dimension shifting elements set on a distant alien planet. You must harness the ability to alter reality in order to complete puzzles and escape from the testing facility where you are being held captive by the natives.

This is a game created by a first year team at Falmouth University on the Digital Games course.

Created by:

  • Kyle Shepherd
  • Kyle Wildman
  • Kyle Walton
  • Viktoria Nestorova
  • Charlie Martin
  • Rafael Pires
  • Piers English
  • Ana Ciorcila
  • Keiran Drees
  • George Scane
  • Jack Summerell
